flawed_nl_solution:
The burritos have 10*120=<<10*120=1020>>1020 calories
That means he gets 1020/6=<<1020/6=170>>170 calories per dollar
The burgers get 5*400=<<5*400=2000>>2000 calories
So he gets 2000/8=<<2000/8=250>>250 calories per dollar
So he gets 250-170=<<250-170=80>>80 more calories per dollar from the burgers
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 1020. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
